Message.Title: Wow! Check out Google Wallet! Forget Paypal!
Message.Msg: Since Ebay/paypal have become anti seller I've always been thinking of leaving ebay/paypal altogether but with recent dealing with ebay/paypal and their harsh service to me after I had just spend thousands on their site I figured enough is enough, I will take my money to ebid where I discovered Google Wallet. I know ebid isn't huge like ebay but with the money I spend it will help grow the site as sellers realize bigger sales and at a lower cost to them. I will ask these sellers to post certain items I am looking for. No more ebay/paypal for me, it's offically over.
